car_rent package¶

Submodules¶

car_rent.settings module¶

car_rent.views module¶

Routes and views for the flask application.

car_rent.views.book_a_car()¶

book a car

receive booking parameters from post. send back to API cloud to book, response front end with result message. rendered book_a_car.html

Returns:

rendered template book_a_car.html

car_rent.views.cancel_a_book()¶

cancel a car booking

Cancel a booking. send back post parameters to API cloud. response front end with result message. rendered book_a_car.html

Returns:

rendered template book_a_car.html

car_rent.views.home()¶

Renders the home page.

car_rent.views.list_available_cars()¶

list available cars in the system

request api back end for all the available cars. API service response with information in json format render template list_available_cars.html with data

Returns:

rendered template list_available_cars.html

car_rent.views.list_rent_history()¶

list user’s rent history

Call API cloud service to retrieve use rent history. response front end with result message in list_rent_history.html

Returns:

rendered template list_rent_history.html

car_rent.views.login()¶

login user into the system

receive username and password from post parameters. send back to API cloud to validate. fail to verify, response front end with result message. succeed to verify, save username in session object for future usage and response with rendered index.html

Returns:

rendered template index.html

car_rent.views.logout()¶

logout user

clear up use session information

Returns:

rendered template logout.html

car_rent.views.register()¶

register user in the system

receive user input in post request, transfer request in json format to API cloud restful interface then get response from API cloud and render template page register.html

Returns:

rendered template register.html

car_rent.views.search_cars()¶

search cars

receive search parameters from post. send back to API cloud to search fail to verify, response front end with result message. succeed to verify, save username in session object for future usage and response with rendered index.html

Returns:

rendered template search_cars.html

car_rent.views.test()¶

Module contents¶

The flask application package.
